CustomField.inlineHelpText: What best describes the applicant's internet connectivity
CustomField.label: Applicant's Internet Connectivity

value.fullName: Has access to the internet at home through a fixed connection e.g., DSL, fiber, cable, etc., satellite, fixed wireless
value.label: Has access to the internet at home through a fixed connection e.g., DSL, fiber, cable, etc., satellite, fixed wireless

value.fullName: Has access to the internet primarily through a phone
value.label: Has access to the internet primarily through a phone

value.fullName: Has access to the internet in public spaces e.g., library, businesses, school.
value.label: Has access to the internet in public spaces e.g., library, businesses, school.
